com.whaleal.mars.core.query

类 Sort.Order

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.whaleal.mars.core.query.Sort.Order
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable
    封闭类:
    Sort

    public static class Sort.Order
extends Object
implements Serializable
    PropertyPath implements the pairing of an Sort.Direction and a property. It is used to provide input for Sort
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Order

        public Order(Sort.Direction direction,
             String property)
        Creates a new Sort.Order instance. if order is null then order defaults to Sort.DEFAULT_DIRECTION
        参数:
        direction - can be null, will default to Sort.DEFAULT_DIRECTION
        property - must not be null or empty.

      • Order

        public Order(Sort.Direction direction,
             String property,
             Sort.NullHandling nullHandlingHint)
        Creates a new Sort.Order instance. if order is null then order defaults to Sort.DEFAULT_DIRECTION
        参数:
        direction - can be null, will default to Sort.DEFAULT_DIRECTION
        property - must not be null or empty.

      • Order

        private Order(Sort.Direction direction,
              String property,
              boolean ignoreCase,
              Sort.NullHandling nullHandling)
        Creates a new Sort.Order instance. if order is null then order defaults to Sort.DEFAULT_DIRECTION
        参数:
        direction - can be null, will default to Sort.DEFAULT_DIRECTION
        property - must not be null or empty.
        ignoreCase - true if sorting should be case insensitive. false if sorting should be case sensitive.
        nullHandling - must not be null.

    • 方法详细资料

      • by

        public static Sort.Order by(String property)
        Creates a new Sort.Order instance. Takes a single property. Direction defaults to Sort.DEFAULT_DIRECTION.
        参数:
        property - must not be null or empty.

      • asc

        public static Sort.Order asc(String property)
        Creates a new Sort.Order instance. Takes a single property. Direction is Sort.Direction.ASC and NullHandling Sort.NullHandling.NATIVE.
        参数:
        property - must not be null or empty.

      • desc

        public static Sort.Order desc(String property)
        Creates a new Sort.Order instance. Takes a single property. Direction is Sort.Direction.DESC and NullHandling Sort.NullHandling.NATIVE.
        参数:
        property - must not be null or empty.
